title: Are the emote icons going to be permanently kept and used?
body:
Haven't unlocked them yet but i've seen someone use the poro one and its so cute I want to earn that emote and the icon.

It would be nice if i can keep on using this after the holiday season so... if we do get this emote can we keep on using it after the holiday season?

I would rather use the cute poro rather than spam my mastery 7 on 10 of my champions for once.

replies.body: Snowdown icons with emotes appear to only be temporary, per the [Snowdown ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/236005088-Snowdown-2016-Crafting-Chests-and-Legend-of-the-Poro-King)guide.  It's likely that they will go away once Snowdown is over, but I don't have any information on returning animations.  Any details on summoner icons emote will likely be announced during events or on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.  Continue to enjoy them for now!

Mmm thanks for the reply but i do hope you guys will allow us emote owners to keep the emote animations.

FYI I haven't unlocked any of them yet.

I've seen my friend use the poro one and one enemy who beat me in lane spamed the same poro icon and it just made me go awwww.
